reviews.review: Portal was good. Portal 2 kicks the shit out of Portal until it becomes Day of Defeat Source. This is a really good game, one of the best (Skyrim still takes 1st though). Good...well everything, I really don't see any flaws in this game. So buy it, it goes on sale a ton, but it's worth more than that. 10/10
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.

You want your freedom? Take iiiiit. That's what I'm counting oooon. 

A brilliant game from start to finish. There's not one bit of criticism I have for Portal 2. This is Valve at their best; amazing dialogue with flawless delivery, fun puzzles to solve, and a wonderful story packed with humor and emotion. There isn't a single second in this wonderful game where you are bored and just hoping to get to the next area. You can just tell how much love and care the developers put into this brilliant, hilarious, and incredible game :)

Space? Space!! SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!!!
Buy it. Play it. Done.

Continuation of the mind-bending game, Portal, takes the puzzles even further, and even tells us about the background of Aperture Laboratories. Very funny dialogues, it even has winks for the Black Mesa facilities. ;)
Still after years it is one of the best games to play solo or with a mate. :p2turret:
Loved the game, have a nice recommendation for it.
Um jogo que superou quaisquer expectativas...

Un jeu à QI, intelligement conçu, pour des niveaux trés bien réalisés. Les ambiances et autres puzzles sont variés et parfois pas évident à résoudre. On ne manquera pas de noter un ton humoristique omniprésent et bien dosé, se qui rend une expérience vidéoludique trés prenante et fluide. Que du bonheur! :)
I'd wait around for a sale to get it.  The game's good but I finished it in one afternoon.

¡Un juego maravilloso y formidable que no puede falta en tu biblioteca Steam! Si Portal 1 se te hizo corto y te quedaste con ganas de más tiempo... ¡Esta es tu gran oportunidad! Ríe con las ingeniosas frases de GLaDOS tanto en el modo un solo jugador como en el modo cooperativo en el que también podrás "hacer pasar un mal rato" a tu compañero para terminar de completar las risas.
Sehr geiles Spiel. Hat mich vom Anfang bis Ende gefesselt und wurde nie Langweilig :-)
Very fun game. Especially for co-op.
Great example of how should every game look like. Awesome and the funniest story, brilliant co-op mode and GLaDOS who called me an "imbecil" = 11 out of 10 :)
I like potatoes and there are many in this game.
Very good game.

Bardzo spodobała mi się ta gra, ale nie mogłem znaleźć tego głupiego ciasta.

A tak w ogóle, to bardzo porządnie wykonana gra logiczna.
This is a fantastic game, and a must play. It's absolutly hilarious and has more lifelike robot characters than most games with actual people. One of the most worthwhile games i've ever bought.

"Oh how we laughed and laughed"
Pure fun
Great game, great fun! Get it!
This game is the shiznite
Portal 2 is an awesome game. It's great for people who enjoy challenging puzzles.
Seriously, if you haven't bought this, you aren't interested in games.
Great puzzles, memorable characters and one of the best endings.
Ca dechire, surtout en multi coop
One of the finest game ever created. It has a deep gameplay and meaningful story that will change the way you look at this world.

Racking in a 3D-Jump 'n' Run atmosphere, solving puzzles - even in multiplayer ! What could be better?

Game is easy to understand, friendly to use even for beginners and challenging while being always fair to the player. I enjoyed playing it a lot!
Great game. I am a little disappointed it was more based on story than puzzles, but a good game nonetheless.
Great game, now give me the pressent :)
GOOD GAME WITH MA FRENDZ

Muss man gespielt haben!
Noch besser als der erste Teil. Super Grafik, super Gameplay, super Story!
this game has the best story i have ever played in a videogame. The voice acting makes you feel right in the action and the puzzles are amazing. 10/10

This is an amazing game, it's innovative, challenging and extremely entertaining. It's atleast as good as the first Portal, if not better. It stands out from all other games with the portal gun mechanic, and you can't really compare it to any other game. If you haven't played this, you should definitely go try it.

Great game, it's simply a masterpiece. The gameplay is simple to get, yet it gets difficult to play the game as it progresses as the puzzles get harder and have all the stuff to use such as excursion funnels, the voice acting is perfect, I just couldn't keep myself from not liking GLaDOS as much as I liked her before, simply amazing.

When life gives you lemons, don't make lemonade. Make life take the lemons back! Get mad! I don't want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these?! Demand to see life's manager! Make life rue the day it thought it could give Cave Johnson lemons! Do you know who I am? I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down! With the lemons! I'm gonna get my engineers to invent a combustible lemon that burns your house down!
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake
Забавная игрушка
I really like the game, but atleast I found the cake in a Left 4 Dead 2 map =/
One of the best games i have ever played, really waiting for portal 3!
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake
SSSSSSSSPPPPPPPPPAAAAAAAAACCCCCCCEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Come il primo, ma molto meglio, più longevo, nuove meccaniche e grafica davvero notevole, più storia e umorismo inglese a tonnellate, ottimo anche per chi non impazzisce per i puzzle game come me
No cake?
Ce Jeu est génial!
If you liked Portal, Portal 2 is at least two times better. Even better story, longer game, and more features.
No cake, still great.
前作を踏襲しての第２作。続編でこけるパターンは多いが、これに関しては期待通りの出来だった。
Торт все-таки существует?
Лучший мультиплеер который я когда-либо видел.
tolles spiel

Игра клас ! был в восторге. Не на скучивает. Когда уже немного надоет решать головоломки идёт какой то action так что скучать не преходится =). Игру прошел концовка супер. Вообщем побольше бы таких игр
Да и ещё радует то что игра не требует крутого железа и даже на минимальных смотрится красиво и играбельно.
My favorite game!!
I like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
<3 the Cube ^^
fun multiplayer
В принципе, тот же Portal, но с новыми устройствами.
Der Coop Modus ist einfach Spitze!

このパズルゲームシリーズはむしろ2から始めるのがオススメです。
Portal 2はPortal 1のような反射神経（アクション）を要求する要素をなくすように配慮されているため、思考にに専念できます。ストーリーは1→2と続いているので、2のシングルプレイヤーをクリアしてから1を遊ぶのも良いでしょう。

Amazing game!

Puzzles, quirky humor, potatoes, and a portal gun.
Does this game even need another recommendation?

前作と比べて倍以上あるボリューム。Portalをやってて「すぐ終わったからフルプライスはなー」と思っている人はご安心を。今回はジョークも楽しい。
マルチプレイは自分が詰まりやすいので、のんびりと待っていてくれる人としたいな。
ボイチャが必須かもしれないので、コミュニケーションが取れない人とだと難しく感じました。
The best single-player experience I've ever had.
The cake is a lie!
This an awesome game, with more clever puzzles and game mechanics than the last one.  Add in the new online co-op and you have something really special.
needs more cake
Лучшая игра из тех что я играл, всем советую
Excellent game,way better than the first one, and it was perfect

I find it hard for sequels to live up to expecations, and with the time between portal 1 and portal 2 releases portal 2 had a lot of hype to live up to. 

I was very pleased with this game. Like portal 1 it's replayability is limited; however it still manages to check the boxxes of funny writing, interesting puzzles, and sarcastic robots and it goes down as a recommend play for me. 

I was left satisfied after finishing this game and will say that it lived up to what I expected from a sequel. 

I recommend playing this game at least once for a hilarious single player experience were you aren't left feeling unfullfilled.

If you enjoyed playing Portal 1, you will enjoy Portal 2 for sure. But even if you did not played Portal 1 you will have a good time solving puzzles with your Portal gun. Nice addition in Portal 2 is the coop mode, where you can solve puzzles with a friend.

Love this game! It's sometimes hard for games to have a good sequel, but Portal 2 nails it! Nothing better than carrying around a potato that talks to you. I'm the man who's gonna burn your house down...with the lemons!

Did you like Portal?

Of course you did.
You'll probably like this.
J'aime beaucoup le jeu, mais je ne trouve pas le stupide gâteau

Amazing.  If you liked the first one, this is a no-brainer.  If you've never played the first one, do not pass Go, do not collect $200, buy it and play it immediately.  Then buy & play this one.

Easily three or four times as long as the first Portal, and that's just the single player campaign.  The characters and plot are great, and the puzzles are engaging.  Listen, stop reading this and play, ok?
Si os gustan los rompecabezas y los comentarios más originales, no lo dudes. Casi mejor que el primer juego. Adictivo por su jubabilidad y incansable con el modo co-op

I was hesitant to get Portal 2 at first. Portal 1 was great but it was a short "expansion pack" experience. I was sure that portal 2 would be more of the same, quirky, clever and miniature. Good but not worth full price. Eventually I picked it up on a sale and boy was I surprised. It wasn't just quirky; it was surprisingly hilarious. It wasn't just clever; it had phenomenal writing. It wasn't miniature; it was full of various activities in a midrid of environments. Portal 2 you surprised me and I'll be sure to come back again! Worth the full price! Ohh and thank goodness they didn't overuse the cake thing... good for portal one and I didn't miss it in portal 2.
Multijugador sencillamente perfecto, sólo superable por Team Fortress 2.

As long as you have a sense of humor and don't mind using your brain instead of your trigger finger, you should love this game.  The gameplay is perfect  whether you have 30 minutes or 3 hours.  We even get co-op play this time around and it really works well!
Epic game of all time!!!
Great game. Very immersive, with just the right amount of comic relief. But the cake was old, and moldy.

Those who played Portal will very much love this game, especially if the over all story creeped you out in a good horror story way like it did me.  The new testing goals are fun, even if parts of the game are down right frightening.
"I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake."
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
Prepare your tylenol and portal away!

絶妙な難易度のFPSパズルと、それを解く事自体に意味を持たせた設定とシナリオ。
個性溢れるキャラクター達。BGM。全てが作り込まれた、完成度の高いゲームだ。
と、思わず本気でお勧めしてしまう程の傑作。プレイしない理由は、何も無い。
This game is what your Physics lessons were missing. FUN

I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake.
This game is worth the purchase. Solving the puzzles is really entertaining, especially with the portal gun, which allows you to jump through portals.
Great game! New mechanics, intelligent puzzles and memorable characters!

Игруля норм, но вот не на долго, вальвы алчные скатины, получили бабос за игру, а совершенствовать ее забыли (конечно они же не получат выгоду за свою работу). Что на моей памяти так это воркшоп сделали за последние 3 года. Хотя у игрули такой высокий потенциал.

シングルで、Co-opで、頭を回して考える。
前作よりボリュームアップしたFPP(First-Person Puzzle)。
前作をプレイしたひとは是非こちらもどうぞ。
Amazing game!

Excelente jogo. Ótima jogabilidade, vários desafios inteligentes, belos gráficos (mesmo se tratando de uma engine antiga), ótimo modo multiplayer e, excelente história com desfecho genial. RECOMENDO, compra obrigatória para quem gosta de games.

FANTASTIC game! Portal 2 lives up to its expectations and more, at least twice as long as the first one and with a much more detailed story and character development. I highly reccomend it to anyone who wants to start thinking with portals, for science!
